title: Strengthening Practical Competencies in Business Strategy: Philological Exploration of Medieval Galician Literature for Professional Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic philological knowledge, overview of medieval European culture and Spanish-language literature
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can analyze five major works of medieval Galician literature using philological methodologies.
Learners can compare interactions between popular and academic literary texts through a scientific framework.
Learners can visualize the historical development of Galician literature in a timeline chart within its historical context.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
